item.title: Bay Area Beogram 8002: Capacitor Replacement
item.description:
In this Beogram 8002 turntable restoration, I began by replacing the capacitors and the phono muting relay. I started with the two electrolytic capacitors on the floating chassis, which are part of the +5 VDC power supply regulation. I replaced them with WIMA MKS capacitors (for values 4.7uF and under) and high-quality Japanese 105Â°C electrolytic capacitors (for values over 4.7uF). The old muting relay was replaced with a fully sealed Omron relay...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bay-area-beogram-8002-capacitor-replacement/
